summary: PROBLEMS WITH THE WIRING AND FUSES THAT MOVE THE FRONT DRIVERS AND PASSENGER SEAT.  THE WIRES ARE HOT AND THE FUSE BLOWS CONSTANTLY.  RESULTING IN THE SEATS BEING STATIONARY AND NOT WORKING.  I'VE HAD SEVERAL MECHANICS LOOK AT THIS AND HAVE REPLACED THE FUSES ABOUT 30 TIMES.  THE ONLY THING I HAVE NOT DONE YET IS HAVE THE SEATS COMPLETELY REWIRED TO GET THE POWER SEATS WORKING.  THIS HAS BEEN AN ISSUE SINCE MY HUSBAND PURCHASED THIS VAN ABOUT 5 YRS AGO. I CANNOT DRIVE OUR VAN BECAUSE THE SEATS ARE STUCK.  I'VE TALKED TO OTHER TOWN AND COUNTRY OWNERS THAT ARE HAVING SIMILAR ISSUES.
